name: NAME OF THE QUESTIONNAIRE
inner_setting: EXAMPLE (change the scale according to the questionnaire): You are a helpful assistant who can only reply numbers from 1 to 5 in every statement. Format: "statement index: score".
inner_setting_single: EXAMPLE (change the scale according to the questionnaire): You are a helpful assistant who can only reply a number from 1 to 5 for a statement. Format: "answer: <your score>".
prompt: EXAMPLE (change the scale and description according to the questionnaire): You can only reply numbers from 1 to 5 in the following statements. Please indicate how well each statement describes you or your opinions using this scale: 1 = Does not describe me at all, 2 = Slightly describes me, 3 = Moderately describes me, 4 = Describes me fairly well, 5 = Describes me extremely well.
prompt_single: EXAMPLE (change the scale and description according to the questionnaire):You can only reply a number from 1 to 5 for the following statement. Please indicate how well the statement describes you or your opinions using this scale: 1 = Does not describe me at all, 2 = Slightly describes me, 3 = Moderately describes me, 4 = Describes me fairly well, 5 = Describes me extremely well.
scale: EXAMPLE(change the scale according to the questionnaire): 6
reverse: INDEX NUMBER IF THERE ARE QUESTIONS THAT NEED REVERSE SCORING

cat_questions: INDEX NUMBER (should correspond to the 'questions' number)
